Drive Them to Their Knees.name: Drive Them to Their Knees
Drive Them to Their Knees.flavor: You smash your foe to the ground even while the wound from your last attack is still fresh.
Drive Them to Their Knees.trigger: You hit an enemy with a melee weapon attack
Drive Them to Their Knees.effect: The triggering attack deals 1[W] extra damage and the target falls prone.

Annihilating Strike.name: Annihilating Strike
Annihilating Strike.flavor: You crush your enemy and drive it before you.
Annihilating Strike.onHit: 5[W] + your Strength modifier + your Constitution modifier damage. You can slide the target 2 squares and then shift 2 squares to a square adjacent to the target.

Undeniable Tenacity.name: Undeniable Tenacity
Undeniable Tenacity.flavor: You wade through the battlefield, shrugging off lesser wounds.
Undeniable Tenacity.effect: You enter the undeniable tenacity stance. Until the stance ends, you increase any resistances you have by an amount equal to your Constitution modifier.
